Jamie Lynn Spears shared and then deleted a prayer for peace after her sister Britney hit out at her in a recent Instagram post.
On Saturday (17 July), Britney wrote a lengthy message to her fans af… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: BBC viewers left confused by 'brilliant' first episode of Baptiste 'What is going on?' - Daily Express
articles.description: BAPTISTE was back on screens on Sunday, with series two of the crime drama starring Tchéky Karyo as troubled but fiercely intelligent detective Julien Baptiste.
articles.content:
"I've allowed it to define me, I suppose I've become a fossil, I relive it every day, you, me and those demons in the daylight.
